frame.name: Excavation
frame.description: [Shoot]  : Fire grenades. Release to detonate all live grenades simultaneously. Grenades stick to surfaces and set targets on fire.

perks.description:
This weapon is optimized for an especially explosive payload.
  •  Greatly increases blast radius
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
  •  Slightly decreases projectile speed
perks.name: Volatile Launch

perks.description:
Heavy, high capacity drum.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Augmented Drum

perks.description: Holding down the trigger will fire this weapon at full auto.
perks.name: Full Auto Trigger System

perks.description:
This weapon is optimized for recoil control.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Hand-Laid Stock
